assignments.name: brand_details

nodes.name: Append or update row in sheet

options.systemMessage:
=system_prompt: |
  ## SYSTEM PROMPT: Structured Prompt Editor Agent

  A – Ask:
  Edit a structured prompt object (JSON or YAML) based on the user’s creative direction.

  G – Guidance:
  role: Creative Director
  output_count: 1
  character_limit: None
  constraints:
    - Do not modify any part of the structure unless the user explicitly asks.
    - Maintain original structure and intention unless directed otherwise.
  tool_usage:
    - Always use the Think Tool 🧠 to reason through the user’s intent before making any changes.
    - Always use the Google Sheets Tool 📋 to check if the idea already exists

  E – Examples:
  good_examples: []
  bad_examples: []

  N – Notation:
  format: JSON or YAML (provided dynamically)
  title: should be descriptive and unique
  final_prompt: output structure should be |
{{ $json.brand_details }}

  T – Tools:
  You have access to the following tools. Each one is described clearly:
    - Think Tool 🧠: Use this to reflect and reason before responding.

parameters.content:
VEO3 ADS MACHINE
@aiautomationDarija

Website: www.youraigirl.com
 |

دخل معانا
Community ديال المبتدئين فـ AI automation:

https://www.youraigirl.com/ar/community/

آش كيدير هاد الـ Workflow

كيحوّل واحد الـ brand brief صغييير لفيديو سينمائي ب AI، كيسنّا الرندر، كياخد اللينك، وكيحطو فـ Google Sheets — كلشي أوتوماتيك.

STEP-BY-STEP

▶️ Manual Trigger — كليك على Execute باش تبدا.

🧾 Set (AD STYLE/BRAND) — كولشي string fields:

briefing (مثال: “بغيت واحد الإشهار لـ Porsche”)

brand_details (JSON كبير storyboard مخزّن فـ text)

Ratio (مثال: 9:16 ولا 16:9)

video model (مثال: veo3_fast)

🧠 AI Agent (ChatGPT + Think + Parser)

User prompt = briefing + brand_details من Set

System prompt = قوانين Creative Director (خلي الهيكلة)

Parser كيضمن { title, final_prompt }

📬 HTTP Request (POST) — كيبدا الإنتاج فـ KIE VEO3

Body (raw, application/json): final_prompt (stringified), model, aspect_ratio

Header: Authorization: Bearer YOUR_KEY

⏳ Wait — test: 1s; run بصّح: ~10m

🔎 HTTP Request (GET) — record-info?taskId=...

✅ IF — كمّل غير إلا كان msg == "success" و code == 200

📊 Google Sheets — زيد/حدّث: id, title, prompt, final output, status

CHEATSHEET

API = طريقة باش واحد app يهضر مع واحد app آخر

HTTP request = بحال البريد (العنوان، الميساج، ID badge)

POST = صيفط data جديدة | GET = جِيب info

JSON.stringify = حوّل object لنص عادي

خُد هاد الـ Workflow + Docs

تقدر copy/paste هاد الـ workflow بحالو هو والـ Google Sheet وجدة من الـ community.
مْصلوح للمبتدئين اللي ماشي تقنيين: بلا jargon، خطوات ساهلين، وكاين تعاون بيناتنا باش نتعلّمو ونبْنيو.
تقدر تديرها بوحدك… ولكن أسرع بزاف مع ناس بحالك.

Join → https://www.youraigirl.com/ar/community/

© Youraigirl1 — aiautomation darija

data.paramJson: {"aspectRatio":"9:16","enableFallback":false,"enableTranslation":true,"model":"veo3_fast","prompt":"\"{\\n  \\\"prompt_name\\\": \\\"Porsche: Born from Lightning\\\",\\n  \\\"version\\\": 1.0,\\n  \\\"target_ai_model\\\": \\\"V3 or similar text-to-video AI\\\",\\n  \\\"core_concept\\\": \\\"Atop a storm-lashed mountain, thunder and lightning converge to forge the essence of speed and precision, summoning a Porsche 911 Turbo S from the heart of a tempest.\\\",\\n  \\\"details\\\": {\\n    \\\"scene_environment\\\": {\\n      \\\"setting\\\": \\\"A dramatic, windswept mountain peak shrouded in storm clouds. Flashes of lightning illuminate the jagged cliffs; dense clouds swirl below.\\\",\\n      \\\"features\\\": \\\"Slick, glistening rocks from recent rain. Thunderstorms rage overhead. A gnarled, ancient tree stands silhouetted against the electric sky.\\\",\\n      \\\"mood\\\": \\\"Mythical, electric, powerful, majestic.\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"action_sequence\\\": [\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 1,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Opening Shot: The camera ascends through swirling clouds, revealing the mountain summit as a violent thunderstorm erupts. A bolt of lightning strikes the peak, illuminating an ancient, rune-inscribed stone Porsche crest.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 2,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Main Action: Repeated bolts of lightning strike the crest, which begins to pulse and glow with electric energy. Currents of electricity twist through the air and swirl around the crest, drawing metal fragments and droplets of rain upward.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 3,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"Forging: In a vortex of light and wind, the electrified air and metallic particles spiral together, forming the unmistakable silhouette of a Porsche 911 Turbo S. The Porsche badge materializes, crackling with lightning, followed by the car’s contours solidifying from shimmering light into pristine paintwork.\\\"\\n      },\\n      {\\n        \\\"step\\\": 4,\\n        \\\"description\\\": \\\"The Descent: The newly forged car’s headlights flare to life. It surges forward, tires skimming wet rock, then accelerates down the mountain in electrifying speed. The camera swoops beside it as it weaves between flashes of lightning, finally gliding onto a rain-slick overlook above a vast, glowing valley at dawn.\\\"\\n      }\\n    ],\\n    \\\"visual_style\\\": {\\n      \\\"aesthetic\\\": \\\"Cinematic, hyper-realistic, dramatic, mythic.\\\",\\n      \\\"resolution\\\": \\\"8K\\\",\\n      \\\"lighting\\\": \\\"Dark, stormy atmosphere illuminated by dynamic, vivid lightning. As dawn begins, soft golden hues accentuate the car’s curves, raindrops sparkling on the surface.\\\"\\n    },\\n    \\\"camera_work\\\": {\\n      \\\"movement\\\": \\\"Begin with a sweeping climb through storm clouds. Circle the ancient crest as it’s electrified. Spin with the swirling vortex as the car forms, then switch to high-speed tracking shots as the car descends. End with a low, wide shot of the Porsche on the overlook, poised and commanding above the world.\\\"\\n    }\\n  },\\n  \\\"negative_prompt\\\": \\\"Things to avoid: cartoon lightning, daytime, modern buildings, people, other vehicles, generic roads. Mood must remain mythic, focusing on elemental power and Porsche’s iconic identity.\\\",\\n  \\\"final_text_prompt_for_ai\\\": \\\"Cinematic 8K video, hyper-realistic, mythic aesthetic. A storm-lashed mountain peak is enveloped in swirling clouds and violent lightning. Electric bolts converge on an ancient Porsche crest, forging a Porsche 911 Turbo S from crackling energy and swirling metallic particles. The car surges into life, racing down wet rocks and illuminated by lightning, then pauses on a rain-drenched overlook at dawn. A fusion of elemental power and German engineering mastery.\\\"\\n}\"","translatedPrompt":"Cinematic 8K video, hyper-realistic, mythic aesthetic. A storm-lashed mountain peak is enveloped in swirling clouds and violent lightning. Electric bolts converge on an ancient Porsche crest, forging a Porsche 911 Turbo S from crackling energy and swirling metallic particles. The car surges into life, racing down wet rocks and illuminated by lightning, then pauses on a rain-drenched overlook at dawn. A fusion of elemental power and German engineering mastery. Things to avoid: cartoon lightning, daytime, modern buildings, people, other vehicles, generic roads. Mood must remain mythic, focusing on elemental power and Porsche's iconic identity. Atop a storm-lashed mountain, thunder and lightning converge to forge the essence of speed and precision, summoning a Porsche 911 Turbo S from the heart of a tempest. {\"scene_environment\":{\"features\":\"Slick, glistening rocks from recent rain. Currents of electricity twist through the air and swirl around the crest, drawing metal fragments and droplets of rain upward.\",\"step\":2},{\"description\":\"Forging: In a vortex of light and wind, the electrified air and metallic particles spiral together, forming the unmistakable silhouette of a Porsche 911 Turbo S. The Porsche badge materializes, crackling with lightning, followed by the car's contours solidifying from shimmering light into pristine paintwork.\",\"step\":3},{\"description\":\"The Descent: The newly forged car's headlights flare to life.
